creator: wgrinfeld@hotmail.com
text:
Rather than adding the required libraries to the front of the classpath, 
catalina.bat replaces it entirely causing problems accessing beans used.

(tested in version jakarta-tomcat-4.0-20010910.zip)

creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
The startup scripts (catalina.bat and catalina.sh) *deliberately* ignore any
CLASSPATH environment variable you might have already set.  CLASSPATH is the
single biggest cause for new user configuration errors, so this will not be
changed.

If you wish to make libraries available to your web applications, put them
either inside the webapp (/WEB-INF/lib) or in the $CATALINA_HOME/lib directory.
